tit.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 主計寮（しゅけいりょう）は律令制において民部省に属した機関。
sen.e: Syukeiryo is an organization which belonged to Minbusho (civil and administrative ministry) under the system of centralized administration established under the ritsuryo legal codes.
Syukeiryo is an organization which belonged to Minbusho (civil and administrative ministry) under the system of centralized administration established under the ritsuryo legal codes.
Shukeiryo is an organization which belonged to Minbusho (civil and administrative ministry) under the Ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the ritsuryo code).
sen.cmt: Shukeiryo としました。律令制 を追加しました。

sen.j: 訓はかずえのつかさなど。
sen.e: The name has other pronunciations in the Japanese way like Kazue no Tsukasa.
The name has other pronunciations in Japanese like Kazue no Tsukasa.
The name has other pronunciations in Japanese like Kazue no Tsukasa.

sen.j: 主計寮は税収（特に租庸調）を把握・監査することが職掌である。
sen.e: The job of Shukeiryo was to figure out and audit the tax revenues (especially those from Soyocho tax law).
The job of Shukeiryo was to figure out and audit the tax revenues (especially those from Soyocho tax law).
The job of Shukeiryo was to figure out and audit the tax revenues (especially those from So-Yo-Cho tax system).
sen.cmt: 他記事と合わせ、So-Yo-Choとしました。

sen.j: 具体的には租税の量を計算し､それが規定の量に達しているか監査するのである。
sen.e: In concrete terms, it was to calculate the volume of tax revenues and audit whether or not it reached the defined volume.
In concrete terms, it was to calculate the volume of tax revenues and audit whether or not it reached the defined volume.
In concrete terms, it was to calculate the volume of tax revenues and audit whether or not it reached the defined volume.

sen.j: そのため数学（算道）に関する技術が求められ､枢要の職として律令制崩壊後も存続した。
sen.e: Therefore the skill of mathematics (Sando) was required, by which it continued as principal job after the collapse of the system under the ritsuryo legal codes.
Therefore the skill of mathematics (Sando) was required, by which it continued as a principal job after the collapse of the system under the ritsuryo legal codes.
Therefore the skill of mathematics (Sando) was required, by which it continued as a principal job after the collapse of the Ritsuryo system.
sen.cmt: 律令制→Ritsuryo system としました。

sen.j: 主計寮の主典の一人は民部省の勾当となってその事務に専念した。
sen.e: One of the staff called Sakan of Syukeiryo became a ministry official called Koto of Minbusho and concentrated on the clerical work.
One of the staff called Sakan of Syukeiryo became a ministry official called Koto of Minbusho and concentrated on the clerical work.
One of the staff called Sakan of Shukeiryo became a ministry official called Koto of Minbusho and concentrated on the clerical work.

sen.j: 主計寮の名称は現在､財務省 (日本)主計局・主計官に継承されている。
sen.e: The name, Shukeiryo has remained as Syukeikyoku (Budget Bureau) and Syukeikan (a budget officer) of Ministry of Finance now.
The name, Shukeiryo has remained as Syukeikyoku (Budget Bureau) and Syukeikan (a budget officer) of Ministry of Finance now.
The name, Shukeiryo has remained as Shukeikyoku (Budget Bureau) and Shukeikan (a budget officer) of Ministry of Finance (Japan) now.
sen.cmt: Shukeikyoku, Shukeikan としました。(日本）を追加しました。

sen.e: Kami at Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade)
Kami at Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade)
Kami (Jugoinojo [Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade])
sen.cmt: 他の記事と表現を統一しました。

sen.e: Suke at Shorokuinoge (Senior Sixth Rank, Lower Grade))
Suke at Shorokuinoge (Senior Sixth Rank, Lower Grade))
Kami (Shorokuinoge [Senior Sixth Rank, Lower Grade])

sen.j: 大允（従六位正七位） 少允（従六位従七位）
sen.e: Taijo at Jurokui (Junior Sixth Rank) Shoshichii (Senior Seventh Rank), Shojo at Jurokui (Junior Sixth Rank) Jushichii (Junior Seventh Rank)
Taijo at Jurokui (Junior Sixth Rank) Shoshichii (Senior Seventh Rank), Shojo at Jurokui (Junior Sixth Rank) Jushichii (Junior Seventh Rank)
Taijo (Jurokui [Junior Sixth Rank] and Shoshichii [Senior Seventh Rank]), Shojo (Jurokui and Jushichii [Junior Seventh Rank])
sen.cmt: 他の記事と表現を統一しました。

sen.j: 大属（従六位従八位） 少属（従六位従八位）
sen.e: Daisakan at Jurokui (Junior Sixth Rank) Juhachii (Junior Eighth Rank), Shosakan at Jurokui (Junior Sixth Rank) Juhachii (Junior Eighth Rank)
Daisakan at Jurokui (Junior Sixth Rank) Juhachii (Junior Eighth Rank), Shosakan at Jurokui (Junior Sixth Rank) Juhachii (Junior Eighth Rank)
Daisakan (Jurokui and Juhachii [Junior Eighth Rank]), Shosakan (Jurokui and Juhachii)
sen.cmt: 他の記事と表現を統一しました。

sen.e: Sanshi at Jurokui (Junior Sixth Rank) Juhachii (Junior Eighth Rank)
Sanshi at Jurokui (Junior Sixth Rank) Juhachii (Junior Eighth Rank)
Sanshi (Jurokui and Juhachii):
sen.cmt: 他の記事と表現を統一しました。コロンを追加しました。

sen.e: -Specialized in accounting
-Specialized in accounting
Specialized in accounting
sen.cmt: ハイフンを削除しましｔ。あ

Kannin Zonin

sen.cmt: 読みを変更し、補足を追加しました。
